title: Alive at Sunset
description: Revenge is an obsession of its own. Three years after her senior year horrors, Luna Ketz struggles to move on. Starting over in an apartment in Bowling Green with her new roommate hasn’t made things easier. Nothing helps, including weekly check-ins to ensure her assailant, Chance Welfrey, is still in a coma.When he disappears from the hospital, Luna’s worst fears are realized. Chance remembers everything. The next time she sees him is on her doorstep. He’s found a new way into her life, and this game of cat and mouse will take all of her wits to survive. *Warning: This book contains content that may be disturbing to some including sexual abuse and graphic violence.*
author: Kayla Krantz
